sn12.18:1.2: Atha kho timbaruko paribbajako yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
sn12.18:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho timbaruko paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn12.18:2.1: “Kim nu kho, bho gotama, sayankatam sukhadukkhanti?
sn12.18:2.3: Kim pana, bho gotama, parankatam sukhadukkhanti?
sn12.18:2.5: Kim nu kho, bho gotama, sayankatanca parankatanca sukhadukkhanti?
sn12.18:2.7: Kim pana, bho gotama, asayankaram aparankaram adhiccasamuppannam sukhadukkhanti?
sn12.18:2.9: Kim nu kho, bho gotama, natthi sukhadukkhanti?
sn12.18:2.12: Tena hi bhavam gotamo sukhadukkham na janati, na passatiti?
sn12.18:2.13: Na khvaham, timbaruka, sukhadukkham na janami, na passami.
sn12.18:3.1: “‘Kim nu kho, bho gotama, sayankatam sukhadukkhan’ti iti puttho samano ‘ma hevam, timbaruka’ti vadesi.
sn12.18:3.2: ‘Kim pana, bho gotama, parankatam sukhadukkhan’ti iti puttho samano ‘ma hevam, timbaruka’ti vadesi.
sn12.18:3.3: ‘Kim nu kho, bho gotama, sayankatanca parankatanca sukhadukkhan’ti iti puttho samano ‘ma hevam, timbaruka’ti vadesi.
sn12.18:3.4: ‘Kim pana, bho gotama, asayankaram aparankaram adhiccasamuppannam sukhadukkhan’ti iti puttho samano ‘ma hevam, timbaruka’ti vadesi.
sn12.18:3.5: ‘Kim nu kho, bho gotama, natthi sukhadukkhan’ti iti puttho samano ‘na kho, timbaruka, natthi sukhadukkham;
sn12.18:3.7: ‘Tena hi bhavam gotamo sukhadukkham na janati, na passati’ti iti puttho samano ‘na khvaham, timbaruka, sukhadukkham na janami, na passami.
sn12.18:3.10: Acikkhatu ca me bhavam gotamo sukhadukkham.
sn12.18:3.11: Desetu ca me bhavam gotamo sukhadukkhan”ti.
sn12.18:4.1: “‘Sa vedana, so vedayati’ti kho, timbaruka, adito sato ‘sayankatam sukhadukkhan’ti evampaham na vadami.
sn12.18:4.2: ‘Anna vedana, anno vedayati’ti kho, timbaruka, vedanabhitunnassa sato ‘parankatam sukhadukkhan’ti evampaham na vadami.
sn12.18:4.3: Ete te, timbaruka, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathagato dhammam deseti:
sn12.18:5.1: Evam vutte, timbaruko paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn12.18:5.3: esaham bhavantam gotamam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
sn12.18:5.4: Upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
